net.jhoogland.jautomata

Class AbstractAutomaton<L,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jhoogland.jautomata.AbstractAutomaton<L,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - label type
    K - weight type (Boolean for regular automata and Double for weighted automata)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Automaton<L,K>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Concatenation, ExplicitAutomaton, Intersection, SingleStringAutomaton, UnaryOperation, Union

    public abstract class AbstractAutomaton<L,K>
extends Object
implements Automaton<L,K>

    Abstract class that implements the semiring() and topologicalOrder() methods of the Automaton interface. The semiring and topological order can be passed to instances of this class via the constructors.

    Most automaton types are a subclass of AbstractAutomaton, though this is not required.

    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland
